Ok, I'm about to make two polls. One of them will be for how long the 
RPG should be paused during Cristmas (and New Years), and the other 
will be for when the pause should start.

Last year, we paused from the 23 to the 3rd I think, to allow 
everyone to spend time with their families and go on vacations and 
all that stuff. This is important, so if you don't vote, the Matrix 
will be mad at you. I think the polls are self-explanatory, but if 
you have any questions, you can send me an IM/E-mail/DeathThreat, and 
I'll be more than happy to reply (unless the drugs have worn off).

So, keep in mind that the RPG will be very slow during this time due 
to lots of us going on vacation (or spending time with family or 
passed out near the beer bottle) anyways, and VOTE!


I should really get some sleep before school tomorrow now. Cya laterz.

PS. Sorry if the pathetic attempts at humor in this post offend 
anyone, I'm in a strange mood. I think I'll have bagels for breakfast 
tomorrow...


Now that I've made an idiot of myself, I'm off to bed. :-)
